activities:
Decusoft offers two hosted(SaaS) web based solutions: EasyAdmin and Compose.

Compose is a Salary/Compensation planning tool that allows our customers to import their employee data for the purposes of managing their Merit, Bonus and Long Term Incetive Plans. 

EasyAdmin is a benefits/fund administration tool that allows Labor Unions to manage their union member’s contributions and benefits. 

Data supplied by clients may include information of employees who reside in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland. All information within the applications are owned and managed by Decusoft’s clients and is kept secured and encrypted within Decusoft’s cloud infrastructure.

Decusoft does not utilize any customer supplied data for any purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online data entered through our applications
